docs.snippet: Prosecutors said greed motivated former Jefferies Group Inc trader Jesse Litvak to defraud the government on mortgage securities, while defense lawyers said their client's "fibs" were perfectly acceptable, during closing arguments at a closely-wat...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said greed motivated former Jefferies Group Inc trader Jesse Litvak to defraud the government on mortgage securities, while defense lawyers said their client's "fibs" were perfectly acceptable, during closing arguments at a closely-watched trial on Wednesday.

headline.main: Frauds or Fibs? Ex-Jefferies Trader's Fraud Case Goes to Jury
headline.print_headline: Frauds or Fibs? Ex-Jefferies Trader's Fraud Case Goes to Jury

docs.snippet: Former West Virginia football player Shawne Alston sued the NCAA and five major conferences Wednesday, saying they violated antitrust laws by agreeing to cap the value of an athletic scholarship at less than the actual cost of attending school....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former West Virginia football player Shawne Alston sued the NCAA and five major conferences Wednesday, saying they violated antitrust laws by agreeing to cap the value of an athletic scholarship at less than the actual cost of attending school.

headline.main: NCAA, Conferences Sued Over Scholarship Value
headline.print_headline: NCAA, Conferences Sued Over Scholarship Value

docs.snippet: It's been a season of no regrets for Creighton's Doug McDermott....
docs.lead_paragraph: It's been a season of no regrets for Creighton's Doug McDermott.

headline.main: Creighton's McDermott Shows He's Beast of Big East
headline.print_headline: Creighton's McDermott Shows He's Beast of Big East
